Country_Name as C = COUNTRYLOOKUP( Country_Number as C )

argument.name: Country_Number
argument.description: The number of the country as defined by the COUNTRIESOFWORLD()function.

argument.name: Country_Name
argument.description: The name of the country as defined by the COUNTRIESOFWORLD()function.

page.description: Given a country name, return the country code, or given a country code, return the country name
page.discussion: The COUNTRYLOOKUP() function returns either the name or number of a country (as defined by the COUNTRIESOFWORLD() function), given the number or name.
